properties.name: component
properties.description: Property used for spring bean-wiring.

properties.name: component.auditor.type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct auditor (AuditorAware implementation).

properties.name: component.validator
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct validators (Validator implementations).

properties.name: component.validator.id-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'id' validator type.

properties.name: component.validator.image-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'image' validator type.

properties.name: component.validator.name-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'name' validator type.

properties.name: component.validator.servings-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'servings' validator type.

properties.name: component.validator.cooking-time-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'cooking time' validator type.

properties.name: component.validator.instructions-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'instructions' validator type.

properties.name: component.validator.version-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'version' validator type.

properties.name: component.mapper
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct mapper (Mapper implementations).

properties.name: component.mapper.id-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'id' mapper type.

properties.name: component.mapper.image-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'image' mapper type.

properties.name: component.mapper.name-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'name' mapper type.

properties.name: component.mapper.servings-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'servings' mapper type.

properties.name: component.mapper.cooking-time-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'cooking time' mapper type.

properties.name: component.mapper.instructions-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'instructions' mapper type.

properties.name: component.mapper.version-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'version' mapper type.

properties.name: component.mapper.difficultyDTO-to-difficulty-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'DifficultyDTOToDifficulty' mapper type.

properties.name: component.mapper.categoryDTO-to-category-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'CategoryDTOToCategory' mapper type.

properties.name: component.mapper.measureUnitDTO-to-measureUnit-type
properties.description: Property used to wire a correct 'MeasureUnitDTOToMeasureUnit' mapper type.
